original: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya ṛddhipādānām anutpādo na te ṛddhipādāḥ,

analyzed: yā ca śūnyā na sā sarva ākāra jña tā na utpādaḥ

original: sa triṣu saṃyogeṣu saktas tad dānaṃ dadāti,

original: yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ dānasaṃjñāyām eṣu triṣu saṃyogeṣu sakto dānaṃ dadāti. iyam ucyate laukikī dānapāramitā. kena kāraṇenocyate  #

original: tathā hi lokato na carati noccarati,

original: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvas tad dānaṃ dadann ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate pratigrāhakaṃ nopalabhyate dānaṃ nopalabhyate vipākañ (ŚsP II-2
analyzed: iha āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra bodhisattvaḥ tat dānam dadan ātmānam na upalabhyate pratigrāhakam na upalabhyate dānam na upalabhyate vipākam

original: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dānaṃ dadāti sarvasattvebhyaś ca tad dānaṃ niryātayati tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhyate,
analyzed: punar aparam āyuṣmam śāradvatī putra dānam dadāti sarva sattvebhyaḥ ca tat dānam niryātayati tān ca sattvān na upalabhyate

original: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittaṃ na samanupaśyati. iyam ucyate āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra lokottarā dānapāramitā. kena  #
analyzed: anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati api ca nimittam na samanupaśyati iyam ucyate āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra lokottarā dāna pāramitā kena
kāraṇena ucyate lokottarā dāna pāramitā iti

original: tathā hi lokottareti lokā carati saṃkrāmati tenocyate lokottarā dānapāramiteti.
analyzed: tathā hi lokottarā iti carati saṃkrāmati tena ucyate lokottarā dāna pāramitā iti

original: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śīlapāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
analyzed: asti āyuṣmam śāradvatīputra śīla pāramitā laukikī asti lokottarā
tatra katamā laukikī śīla pāramitā

original: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ śīlaṃ rakṣati tac ca saṃniśrito
analyzed: iha āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ śīlam rakṣati tat ca

original: bhavati tasyaivaṃ bhavaty aham śīlaṃ rakṣāmi sattvānām arthāya. idam śīlam ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ
analyzed: bhavati tasya evam bhavati aham śīlam rakṣāmi sattvānām arthāya idam śīlam aham buddha ājñām

original: karomi tac ca śīlaṃ rakṣann upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ
analyzed: karomi tat ca śīlam rakṣan upalambha yogena sarva sattvaiḥ sārdham sādhāraṇam kṛtvā anuttarāyām

original: samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anena me śīlaphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmeṣu sukhino
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati anena me śīla phalena ete sattvāḥ dṛṣṭe eva dharmeṣu sukhinaḥ

original: bhavantv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv iti. sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas tac chīlaṃ rakṣati
analyzed: bhavantu an upādāya ca parinirvāntu iti sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktaḥ tat śīlam rakṣati

original: yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ śīlasaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī śīlapāramiteti.

original: tathā hi lokato na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati tad ucyate laukikīti.
analyzed: tathā hi lokatas na carati na uccarati na saṃkrāmati tat ucyate laukikī iti
tatra katamā lokottarā śīla pāramitā
yat uta tri maṇḍala pariśuddhiḥ
tatra katamā tri maṇḍala pariśuddhiḥ

original: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ śīlaṃ rakṣann ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate
analyzed: iha āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ śīlam rakṣan ātmānam na upalabhyate

original: sattvān nopalabhyate śīlaṃ nopalabhyate vipākaṃ nābhinandati sarvasattvebhyaś ca
analyzed: sattvāt na upalabhyate śīlam na upalabhyate vipākam na abhinandati sarva sattvebhyaḥ ca

analyzed: tat śīlam niryātayati tān ca sattvān na upalabhyate nuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

analyzed: pariṇāmayati api ca nimittam na samanupaśyati iyam ucyate lokottarā śīla pāramitā tathā

original: anena me kṣāntiphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmasukhino bhavantv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv
analyzed: anena me kṣānti phalena ete sattvāḥ dṛṣṭe eva dharma sukhinaḥ bhavantu an upādāya ca parinirvāntu

analyzed: kṣānti saṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī kṣānti pāramitā iti tathā hi lokatas na carati na uccarati

yat uta tri maṇḍala pariśuddhiḥ
tatra katamā tri maṇḍala pariśuddhiḥ

analyzed: tat ca saṃniśritaḥ ārabhate tasya evam bhavati aham vīryam ārabhate sarva sattvānām arthāya

analyzed: ayam kāyaḥ idam cittam idam vīryam aham buddha ājñām karomi aham vīrya pāramitāyām carāmi

original: tac ca vīryam upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarayāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati,
analyzed: tat ca vīryam upalambha yogena sarva sattvaiḥ sārdham sādhāraṇam kṛtvā anuttarayām samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati

original: anena me vīryaphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmasukhino bhavatv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv iti. sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas taṃ vīryam ārabhate,
analyzed: anena me vīrya phalena ete sattvāḥ dṛṣṭe eva dharma sukhinaḥ bhavatu an upādāya ca parinirvāntu iti sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktaḥ tam vīryam ārabhate

original: yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ vīryasaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī vīryapāramiteti. tathā hi kokato na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati tad  #
analyzed: yat uta ātma saṃjñāyām para saṃjñāyām vīrya saṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī vīrya pāramitā iti tathā hi kokataḥ na carati na uccarati na saṃkrāmati tat
ucyate laukikī iti
tatra katamā lokottarā vīrya pāramitā
yat uta tri maṇḍala pariśuddhiḥ
tatra katamā tri maṇḍala pariśuddhiḥ

original: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvo vīryam ārabhamāṇa ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate
analyzed: iha āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ vīryam ārabhamāṇaḥ ātmānam na upalabhyate

original: sattvān nopalabhyate vīryaṃ nopalabhyate vipākaṃ ca nābhinandati sarvasattvebhyaś
analyzed: sattvāt na upalabhyate vīryam na upalabhyate vipākam ca na abhinandati sarva sattvebhyaḥ

original: ca tad vīryaṃ niryatayati tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhate nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
analyzed: ca tat vīryam niryatayati tān ca sattvān na upalabhate nuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

analyzed: pariṇāmayam ca api ca nimittam na samanupaśyati iyam ucyate lokottarā vīrya pāramitā tathā hi

analyzed: lokāt carati uccarati saṃkrāmati tat ucyate lokottarā iti

original: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dhyānapāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
analyzed: asti āyuṣmam śāradvatīputra dhyāna pāramitā laukikī asti lokottarā

analyzed: iha āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ dhyānam samāpadyate

original: tac ca saṃniśritaḥ samāpadyate tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dhyānāni samāpadyate sarvasattvānām arthāya,
analyzed: tat ca saṃniśritaḥ samāpadyate tasya evam bhavati aham dhyānāni samāpadyate sarva sattvānām arthāya
imāni dhyānāni

analyzed: aham buddha ājñām karomi tat ca dhyānam samāpadyamānaḥ upalambha yogena sarva sattvaiḥ

original: sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anena me dhyānaphalenaite
analyzed: sārdham sādhāraṇam kṛtvā anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati anena me dhyāna phalena ete

analyzed: sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktaḥ tat dhyānam samāpadyate

tatra katamā tri maṇḍala pariśuddhiḥ

original: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvo dhyānāni samāpadyamāna ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate sattvān nopalabhyate vipākaṃ ca nābhinandati,

original: ye ca sattvās taṃ bodhivṛkṣagandham ājighreyus teṣāṃ na kaścid vyādhir bhaved kāye vā citte veti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
analyzed: ye ca sattvāḥ tam bodhivṛkṣa gandham ājighreyuḥ teṣām na kaścid vyādhiḥ bhavet kāye vā citte vā iti na sthātavyam upalambha yogena

original: tatra ca me buddhakṣetre na rūpaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
analyzed: tatra ca me buddhakṣetre na rūpa śabdaḥ bhavet iti na sthātavyam upalambha yogena

original: na vedanāśabdo bhaven na saṃjñāśabdo bhaven na saṃskāraśabdo bhaven na vijñānaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
analyzed: na vedanā śabdaḥ bhavet na saṃjñā śabdaḥ bhavet na saṃskāra śabdaḥ bhavet na vijñāna śabdaḥ bhavet iti na sthātavyam upalambha yogena

original: na dhātuśabdo nāyatanaśabdo na pratītyasamutpādaśabdo bhaved iti sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
analyzed: na dhātu śabdaḥ na āyatana śabdaḥ na pratītyasamutpāda śabdaḥ bhavet iti sthātavyam upalambha yogena

original: na dānapāramitāśabdo bhaven na śīlapāramitāśabdo bhaven na kṣāntipāramitāśabdo bhaven
analyzed: na dāna pāramitā śabdaḥ bhavet na śīla pāramitā śabdaḥ bhavet na kṣānti pāramitā śabdaḥ bhavet

original: na vīryapāramitāśabdo bhaven na dhyānapāramitāśabdo bhaven na prajñāpāramitāśabdo
analyzed: na vīrya pāramitā śabdaḥ bhavet na dhyāna pāramitā śabdaḥ bhavet na prajñāpāramitā śabdaḥ
bhavet iti na sthātavyam upalambha yogena

original: nādhyātmaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na bahirdhāśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
analyzed: na adhyātma śūnyatā śabdaḥ bhavet na bahirdhā śūnyatā śabdaḥ bhavet na adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā śabdaḥ bhavet iti na sthātavyam upalambha yogena

original: na śūnyatāśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na mahāśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na paramārthaśūnyatāśabdo
analyzed: na śūnyatā śūnyatā śabdaḥ bhavet na mahā śūnyatā śabdaḥ bhavet na paramārtha śūnyatā śabdaḥ

original: bhaven na saṃsrtaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
analyzed: bhavet na saṃsrta śūnyatā śabdaḥ bhavet na asaṃskṛta śūnyatā śabdaḥ bhavet iti na sthātavyam upalambha yogena

original: nātyantaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nānavarāgraśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nānavakāraśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na prakṛtiśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
analyzed: na atyanta śūnyatā śabdaḥ bhavet na an avara agra śūnyatā śabdaḥ bhavet na an avakāra śūnyatā śabdaḥ bhavet na prakṛti śūnyatā śabdaḥ bhavet iti na sthātavyam upalambha yogena

original: na sarvadharmaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nānupalambhaśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
analyzed: na sarva dharma śūnyatā śabdaḥ bhavet na sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatā śabdaḥ bhavet na anupalambha śūnyatā śabdaḥ bhavet iti na sthātavyam upalambha yogena

original: nābhāvaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na svabhāvaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena, (ŚsP II-2 182)
analyzed: na abhāva śūnyatā śabdaḥ bhavet na svabhāva śūnyatā śabdaḥ bhavet na abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā śabdaḥ bhavet iti na sthātavyam upalambha yogena

original: na smṛtyupasthānaśabdo bhaven na samyakprahāṇaśabdo bhaven na ṛddhipādaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
analyzed: na smṛti upasthāna śabdaḥ bhavet na samyak prahāṇa śabdaḥ bhavet na ṛddhipāda śabdaḥ bhavet iti na sthātavyam upalambha yogena

original: nendriyaśabdo bhaven na balaśabdo bhaven na bodhyaṅgaśabdo bhaven nāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaśabdo bhaven nāryasatyaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavaym upalambhayogena,
analyzed: na indriya śabdaḥ bhavet na bala śabdaḥ bhavet na bodhyaṅga śabdaḥ bhavet na ārya aṣṭāṅga mārga śabdaḥ bhavet na ārya satya śabdaḥ bhavet iti na sthātavaym upalambha yogena

original: na dhyānaśabdo bhaven nāpramāṇaśabdo bhaven nārūpyasamāpattiśabdo bhaven na vimokṣaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
analyzed: na dhyāna śabdaḥ bhavet na apramāṇa śabdaḥ bhavet na ārūpya samāpatti śabdaḥ bhavet na vimokṣa śabdaḥ bhavet iti na sthātavyam upalambha yogena
na anupūrva vihāra samāpatti śabdaḥ bhavet na śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukha śabdaḥ

original: bhaven nābhijñāśabdo bhaven na samādhiśabdo bhaven na dhāraṇīmukhaśabdo bhaved iti
analyzed: bhavet na abhijñā śabdaḥ bhavet na samādhi śabdaḥ bhavet na dhāraṇī mukha śabdaḥ bhavet iti
na sthātavyam upalambha yogena

original: na tathāgatabalaśabdo bhaven na vaiśāradyaśabdo bhaven na pratisaṃvidśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
analyzed: na tathāgata bala śabdaḥ bhavet na vaiśāradya śabdaḥ bhavet na pratisaṃvid śabdaḥ bhavet iti na sthātavyam upalambha yogena

original: na mahāmaitrīśabdo bhaven na mahākaruṇāśabdo bhaven nāveṇikabuddhadharmaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
analyzed: na mahā maitrī śabdaḥ bhavet na mahā karuṇā śabdaḥ bhavet na āveṇika buddha dharma śabdaḥ bhavet iti na sthātavyam upalambha yogena

original: na srotaāpattiśabdo bhaven na sakṛdāgāmiśabdo bhaven nānāgāmiśabdo bhaven nārhattvaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
analyzed: na srotaāpatti śabdaḥ bhavet na sakṛdāgāmi śabdaḥ bhavet na anāgāmi śabdaḥ bhavet na arhat tva śabdaḥ bhavet iti na sthātavyam upalambha yogena

original: na pratyekabuddhaśabdo bhaven na buddhaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na pratyekabuddha śabdaḥ bhavet na buddha śabdaḥ bhavet iti na sthātavyam upalambha yogena tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sarvadharmā nopalabdhāḥ.
analyzed: tathā hi tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sarva dharmāḥ na upalabdhāḥ

original: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
analyzed: evam khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām na sthātavyam upalambha yogena
atha āyuṣmataḥ śāradvatīputasya etat abhūt

original: kathaṃ punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam?
analyzed: katham punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām sthātavyam

original: athāyuṣmataḥ subhūtir āyuṣmataḥ śāradvatīputrasya cetasyaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmataṃ śāradvatīputram āmantrayati sma. tat kiṃ manyase?
analyzed: atha āyuṣmataḥ subhūtiḥ āyuṣmataḥ śāradvatīputrasya cetasya eva cetaḥ parivitarkam ājñāya āyuṣmatam śāradvatīputram āmantrayati sma tat kim manyase

original: āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra kva tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthitaḥ.
analyzed: āyuṣman chāradvatī putra kva tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthitaḥ

original: āha: na kvacid āyuṣman subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthita iti apratisthitamānasaḥ
analyzed: āha na kvacid āyuṣman subhūte tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthitaḥ iti a pratisthita mānasaḥ

original: khalu punar āyuṣman subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sa rūpe na sthito vedanāyāṃ
analyzed: khalu punar āyuṣman subhūte tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sa rūpe na sthitaḥ vedanāyām

original: na sthitaḥ saṃjñāyāṃ na sthitaḥ saṃskāreṣu na sthito vijñāne na sthitaḥ.
analyzed: na sthitaḥ saṃjñāyām na sthitaḥ saṃskāreṣu na sthitaḥ vijñāne na sthitaḥ

original: na cakṣuṣi sthito na śrotre sthito na ghrāṇe sthito na jihvāyāṃ sthito na kāye sthito na manasi sthitaḥ.
analyzed: na cakṣuṣi sthitaḥ na śrotre sthitaḥ na ghrāṇe sthitaḥ na jihvāyām sthitaḥ na kāye sthitaḥ na manasi sthitaḥ
śsp ii

original: na rūpe sthito na śabde sthito na gandhe sthito na rase sthito na sparśe sthito na dharmeṣu sthitaḥ.
analyzed: na rūpe sthitaḥ na śabde sthitaḥ na gandhe sthitaḥ na rase sthitaḥ na sparśe sthitaḥ na dharmeṣu sthitaḥ

original: na cakṣurvijñāne sthito na śrotravijñāne sthito na ghrāṇavijñāne sthito na jihvāvijñāne sthito na kāyavijñāne sthito na manovijñāne sthitaḥ.
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ vijñāne sthitaḥ na śrotra vijñāne sthitaḥ na ghrāṇa vijñāne sthitaḥ na jihvā vijñāne sthitaḥ na kāya vijñāne sthitaḥ na manaḥ vijñāne sthitaḥ

original: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe sthito na śrotrasaṃsparśe sthito na ghrāṇasaṃsparśe sthito na jihvāsaṃsparśe sthito na kāyasaṃsparśe sthito na manaḥsaṃsparśe
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ saṃsparśe sthitaḥ na śrotra saṃsparśe sthitaḥ na ghrāṇa saṃsparśe sthitaḥ na jihvā saṃsparśe sthitaḥ na kāya saṃsparśe sthitaḥ na manaḥ saṃsparśe

original: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito na śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanāyām sthitaḥ na śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanāyām sthitaḥ

original: na ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito
analyzed: na ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanāyām sthitaḥ na jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanāyām sthitaḥ

original: na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthitaḥ.
analyzed: na kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanāyām sthitaḥ na manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanāyām sthitaḥ

original: na pṛthivīdhātau sthito nābdhātau sthito na tejodhātau sthito na vāyudhātau sthito nākāśadhātau sthito na vijñānadhātau sthitaḥ.
analyzed: na pṛthivī dhātau sthitaḥ na ap dhātau sthitaḥ na tejaḥ dhātau sthitaḥ na vāyu dhātau sthitaḥ na ākāśa dhātau sthitaḥ na vijñāna dhātau sthitaḥ

original: nāvidyāyāṃ sthito na saṃskāreṣu sthito na vijñāne sthito na nāmarūpe sthito na ṣaḍāyatane
analyzed: na avidyāyām sthitaḥ na saṃskāreṣu sthitaḥ na vijñāne sthitaḥ na nāma rūpe sthitaḥ na ṣaṣ āyatane

original: sthito na sparśe sthito na vedanāyāṃ sthito na tṛṣṇāyāṃ sthito nopādāne sthito na
analyzed: sthitaḥ na sparśe sthitaḥ na vedanāyām sthitaḥ na tṛṣṇāyām sthitaḥ na upādāne sthitaḥ na

original: bhave sthito na jātau sthito na jarāmaraṇe sthitaḥ.
analyzed: bhave sthitaḥ na jātau sthitaḥ na jarā maraṇe sthitaḥ

original: na dānapāramitāyāṃ sthito na śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito na vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthito na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: na dāna pāramitāyām sthitaḥ na śīla pāramitāyām sthitaḥ na kṣānti pāramitāyām sthitaḥ na vīrya pāramitāyām sthitaḥ na dhyāna pāramitāyām sthitaḥ na prajñāpāramitāyām

original: nādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ
analyzed: na adhyātma śūnyatāyām sthitaḥ na bahirdhā śūnyatāyām sthitaḥ na adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatāyām

original: sthito na śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na mahāśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ
analyzed: sthitaḥ na śūnyatā aśūnyatāyām sthitaḥ na mahā śūnyatāyām sthitaḥ na paramārtha śūnyatāyām

original: sthito na saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nātyantaśūnyatāyāṃ
analyzed: sthitaḥ na saṃskṛta śūnyatāyām sthitaḥ na asaṃskṛta śūnyatāyām sthitaḥ na atyanta śūnyatāyām

original: sthito nānavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nānavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ
analyzed: sthitaḥ na an avara agra śūnyatāyām sthitaḥ na anavakāra śūnyatāyām sthitaḥ na prakṛti śūnyatāyām

original: sthito na sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nānupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ
analyzed: sthitaḥ na sarva dharma śūnyatāyām sthitaḥ na sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatāyām sthitaḥ na anupalambha śūnyatāyām

original: sthito nābhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitaḥ.
analyzed: sthitaḥ na abhāva śūnyatāyām sthitaḥ na svabhāva śūnyatāyām sthitaḥ na abhāva svabhāva śūnyatāyām sthitaḥ

original: na smṛtyupasthāneṣu sthito na samyakprahāṇeṣu sthito na ṛddhipādeṣu sthito nendriyeṣu
analyzed: na smṛti upasthāneṣu sthitaḥ na samyakprahāṇeṣu sthitaḥ na ṛddhipādeṣu sthitaḥ na indriyeṣu

original: sthito na baleṣu sthito na bodhyaṅgeṣu sthito nāryāṣṭāṅge marge sthito nāryasatyeṣu
analyzed: sthitaḥ na baleṣu sthitaḥ na bodhyaṅgeṣu sthitaḥ na ārya aṣṭāṅge marge sthitaḥ na ārya satyeṣu

original: sthito na dhyāneṣu sthito nāpramāṇeṣu sthito nārūpyasamāpattiṣu sthito na vimokṣeṣu
analyzed: sthitaḥ na dhyāneṣu sthitaḥ na apramāṇeṣu sthitaḥ na ārūpya samāpattiṣu sthitaḥ na vimokṣeṣu
sthitaḥ na anupūrva vihāra samāpattiṣu sthitaḥ na śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukheṣu

original: sthito nābhijñāsu sthito na samādhiṣu sthito na dhāraṇīmukheṣu (ŚsP II-2 184)
analyzed: sthitaḥ na abhijñāsu sthitaḥ na samādhiṣu sthitaḥ na dhāraṇī mukheṣu

original: sthito na tathāgatabaleṣu sthito na vaiśāradyeṣu sthito na pratisaṃvitsu sthito na
analyzed: sthitaḥ na tathāgata baleṣu sthitaḥ na vaiśāradyeṣu sthitaḥ na pratisaṃvitsu sthitaḥ na

original: mahāmaitryā sthito na mahākaruṇāyāṃ sthito nāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu sthito na sarvajñatāyāṃ
analyzed: mahā maitryā sthitaḥ na mahā karuṇāyām sthitaḥ na āveṇika buddha dharmeṣu sthitaḥ na sarvajña tāyām

original: sthito na mārgākārajñatāyāṃ sthito na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthitaḥ.
analyzed: sthitaḥ na mārga ākārajña tāyām sthitaḥ na sarva ākārajña tāyām sthitaḥ
subhūtiḥ āha

original: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
analyzed: evam khalu āyuṣman chāradvatī putra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām sthātavyam

original: yathā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rūpe naiva sthito nāsthito vedanāyāṃ naiva
analyzed: yathā tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ rūpe na eva sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ vedanāyām na eva

original: sthito nāsthitaḥ samjñāyām naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ saṃskāreṣu naiva sthito nāsthito
analyzed: sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ samjñāyām na eva sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ saṃskāreṣu na eva sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ
vijñāne na eva sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ

original: cakṣuṣi naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śrotre naiva sthito nāsthito ghrāṇe naiva sthito nāsthito jihvāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kāye naiva sthito  #
analyzed: cakṣuṣi na eva sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ śrotre na eva sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ ghrāṇe na eva sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ jihvāyām na eva sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ kāye na eva sthitaḥ
na asthitaḥ manasi nā eva sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ

original: rūpe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śabde naiva sthito nāsthito gandhe naiva sthito nāsthito rase naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ sparśe naiva sthito nāsthito  #
analyzed: rūpe na eva sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ śabde na eva sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ gandhe na eva sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ rase na eva sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ sparśe na eva sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ
dharmeṣu na eva sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ

original: cakṣurvijñāne naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śrotravijñāne naiva sthito nāsthito ghrāṇavijñāne
analyzed: cakṣuḥ vijñāne na eva sthitaḥ na a sthitaḥ śrotra vijñāne na eva sthitaḥ na a sthitaḥ ghrāṇa vijñāne

original: naiva sthito nāsthito jihvāvijñāne naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kāyavijñāne naiva sthito
analyzed: na eva sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ jihvā vijñāne na eva sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ kāya vijñāne na eva sthitaḥ
na asthitaḥ manaḥ vijñāne na eva sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ

original: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśe naiva sthito nāsthito ghrāṇasaṃsparśe
analyzed: cakṣuḥ saṃsparśe na eva sthitaḥ na a sthitaḥ śrotra saṃsparśe na eva sthitaḥ na a sthitaḥ ghrāṇa saṃsparśe

original: naiva sthito nāsthito jihvāsaṃsparśe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kāyasaṃsparśe naiva sthito
analyzed: na eva sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ jihvā saṃsparśe na eva sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ kāya saṃsparśe na eva sthitaḥ

analyzed: atha khalu tatra parṣadi keṣāñcid deva putrāṇām etat abhavat

original: yāni tāni yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣapadāni yakṣamantritāni yakṣarutāni yakṣapravyāhṛtāni vijñāyante,
analyzed: yāni tāni yakṣāṇām yakṣa padāni yakṣa mantritāni yakṣa rutāni yakṣa pravyāhṛtāni vijñāyante
tāni mantrayamāṇāni

original: idaṃ punar api na vijñāyate yad āryasubhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate pravyāharati deśayati vibhajaty uttānīkaroti upadiśati.

original: athāyuṣmān subhūtis teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya tān devaputrān āmantrayate sma,

na vijñāyate deva putrāṇām āmantrayate
deva putrāḥ āhuḥ
na vijñāyate ārya subhūte
subhūtiḥ āha

original: tathā hi devaputrā ekākṣaram api na pravyāhrite tan na śruyate yan na śruyate tan na vijñāyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi deva putrāḥ eka akṣaram api na pravyāhrite tat na śruyate yat na śruyate tat na vijñāyate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hy akṣarāṇi prajñāpāramitā na cātra kaścid deśayitā na śrotā na vijñātā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na hi akṣarāṇi prajñāpāramitā na ca atra kaścid deśayitā na śrotā na vijñātā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: anakṣarā hi devaputrās tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhiḥ tad yathāpi
analyzed: anakṣarā hi deva putrāḥ tathāgatānām arhatām samyaksaṃbuddhānām bodhiḥ tat yathā api

original: nāma devaputrās tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho buddhanirmitaṃ nirmimīte. sa ca punar
analyzed: nāma deva putrāḥ tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ buddha nirmitam nirmimīte sa ca punar
nirmitaḥ catasraḥ parṣadaḥ nirmimītaḥ bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī upāsaka upāsikāḥ

original: atha sa nirmitaḥ tābhyo nirmitābhyaś catasṛbhyaḥ parṣadbhyo dharmaṃ deśayet. tat kiṃ manyadhve?
analyzed: atha sa nirmitaḥ tābhyaḥ nirmitābhyaḥ catasṛbhyaḥ parṣadbhyaḥ dharmam deśayet tat kim manyadhve

original: devaputrāḥ. api tu tatra parṣadi kenacid deśitaṃ bhavet?
analyzed: deva putrāḥ api tu tatra parṣadi kenacid deśitam bhavet
kenacid śrutam ājñātam ca bhavet
āhuḥ no hi idam bhadanta subhūte
subhūtiḥ āha

original: evam eva devaputrāḥ sarvadharmā nirmitopamās tatra kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacic chrutaṃ na kenacid ājñātaṃ,
analyzed: evam eva deva putrāḥ sarva dharmāḥ nirmita upamāḥ tatra kenacid deśitam na kenacid śrutam na kenacid ājñātam

original: tad yathāpi nāma devaputrāḥ svapnāntaragataḥ puruṣas tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhadharmaṃ deśayantaṃ paśyet. tat kiṃ manyadhve?
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma deva putrāḥ svapna antara gataḥ puruṣaḥ tathāgatam arhantam samyaksaṃbuddha dharmam deśayantam paśyet tat kim manyadhve

original: devaputrāḥ. api nu tatra deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā ājñātaṃ vā bhavet.
analyzed: deva putrāḥ api nu tatra deśitam vā śrutam vā ājñātam vā bhavet
āhuḥ no hi idam bhadanta subhūte
subhūtiḥ āha

original: evam eva devaputrāḥ svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmās tatra na kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacid
analyzed: evam eva deva putrāḥ svapna upamāḥ sarva dharmāḥ tatra na kenacid deśitam na kenacid

analyzed: sthitvā buddhasya varṇam bhāṣeyātām dharmasya varṇam bhāṣeyātām saṃghasya varṇam bhāṣeyātām

analyzed: tatra ubhayatas pratiśrutkāt svaraḥ niścatet tat kim manyadhve

original: devaputrāḥ. api nu tenaikena pratiśrutkāśabdena dvitīyapratiśrutkāśabdo vijñāpito bhavet.
analyzed: deva putrāḥ api nu tena ekena pratiśrutkā śabdena dvitīya pratiśrutkā śabdaḥ vijñāpitaḥ bhavet

analyzed: tat yathā api nāma deva putrāḥ dakṣaḥ māyākāraḥ vā māyākāra antevāsī vā catur mahāpathe tathāgatam

original: evam etad devaputrā evam etad iti tad anabhilāpyā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddānāṃ bodhiḥ,
analyzed: evam etat deva putrāḥ evam etat iti tat an abhilāpyā tathāgatānām arhatām samyaksaṃbuddānām bodhiḥ

original: apravyāhārā sā na kenacid chrutā na vijñātā.
analyzed: a pravyāhārā sā na kenacid śrutā na vijñātā

original: tena hi devaputrā ye srotaāpattiphale sthātukāmāḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
analyzed: tena hi deva putrāḥ ye srotaāpatti phale sthātu kāmāḥ srotaāpatti phalam sākṣātkartu kāmāḥ na imām kṣāntim an āgamya

original: ye sakṛdāgāmiphale sthātukāmāḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
analyzed: ye sakṛdāgāmi phale sthātu kāmāḥ sakṛdāgāmi phalam sākṣātkartu kāmāḥ na imām kṣāntim an āgamya

original: ye 'nāgāmīphale sthātukāmā anāgāmiphalaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
analyzed: ye nāgāmī phale sthātu kāmāḥ anāgāmi phalam sākṣātkartu kāmāḥ na imām kṣāntim an āgamya

original: ye 'rhattve sthātukāmā arhattvaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
analyzed: ye rhat tve sthātu kāmāḥ arhat tvam sākṣātkartu kāmāḥ na imām kṣāntim an āgamya

original: ye pratyekabodhau sthātukāmāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ sākṣātkartukamā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
analyzed: ye pratyeka bodhau sthātu kāmāḥ pratyeka bodhim sākṣātkartu kamāḥ na imām kṣāntim an āgamya

original: ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sthātukāmā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya.
analyzed: ye nuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau sthātu kāmāḥ anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim sākṣātkartu kāmāḥ na imām kṣāntim an āgamya

original: evaṃ khalu devaputrā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
analyzed: evam khalu deva putrāḥ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathama citta utpādam upādāya prajñāpāramitāyām sthātavyam
a pravyāhārā śravaṇa tām upādāya

original: śatasāhasryāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvitīyakhaṇḍe caturdaśamaḥ parivartaḥ samāptaḥ.
analyzed: śatasāhasryāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ dvitīya khaṇḍe caturdaśamaḥ parivartaḥ samāptaḥ
